Uses of Class
utilities.Matrix

  • Uses of Matrix in utilities

    Methods in utilities that return Matrix
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Matrix Matrix.clone()
    return a copy of itself
    Matrix Matrix.extend​(int length)
    extends a column matrix to a length long matrix (not very usefull)
    Matrix Matrix.power​(int n)
    raise the matrix to the power n
    Matrix Matrix.product​(Matrix m)
    return the product of the two matrix
    Matrix Matrix.transpose()
    transpose the matrix

    void Matrix.fusion​(Matrix m)
    not realy a matrix operation but usefull in neural network calculation.
